Title: One longtime Gaiman fan on where we go from here
Description:
Pop culture critic Glen Weldon says he can't separate the art from the artist.
But in light of the sexual abuse allegations against Gaiman, he will separate himself from the author's future work.

Title: TikTok says it will go dark on Sunday without additional assurances from the Biden administration on ban enforcement
Description: TikTok said it will be forced to go dark on January 19, the day the ban is set to take effect, without more assurances it won't be enforced.

Title: A pro tennis player without a clothing sponsor bought 'vintage' dresses online for the Australian Open: 'I've found them on eBay'
Description:
For Destanee Aiava, who doesn't have a clothing sponsor, her on-court styles were completely up to her.
And she chose to pay homage to past champions.

Title: Nightclubs are bumping, traffic is snarled, and top restaurants are booked. Welcome to Palm Beach under Trump.
Description:
World leaders and power brokers are flocking to Trump's "Winter White House" at Mar-a-Lago.
The sunny seaside resort town may never be the same.

Title: The Netgear Nighthawk Wi-Fi 6E Router is only $280 on Amazon today
Description: Treat your web-connected devices to fast, reliable, and secure Wi-Fi with the Netgear Nighthawk Wi-Fi 6E Router, now on sale for just $271!

Title: This LG 55-inch B3 Series OLED markdown is the deal of all deals!
Description:
There’s never been a better time to invest in a new OLED TV.

Title: Microsoft is finally adding a highly requested feature to the Taskbar on Windows 11
Description: You'll soon be able to show your PCs battery percentage directly on the Taskbar in Windows 11.

Title: Call of Duty devs issue a new community update addressing cheating and other player concerns, as well as confirming console-only ranked play for Season 2
Description: The latest update from the Call of Duty dev team takes aim at cheaters and reveals plans to address player feedback in Season 2 and 3.

Title: SpaceX launching 27 Starlink satellites today in 1st flight since Starship explosion
Description:
SpaceX is set to launch 27 of its Starlink internet satellites today (Jan.
18), just two days after a test flight of its Starship megarocket ended in an explosion.

Title: ‘Pretty crazy’: Tien youngest since Nadal into Australian Open last 16
Description: At 19 years of age, Learner Tien becomes the youngest man to reach the Australian Open fourth round since Rafael Nadal.

Title: Forgotten no more: The Black South Africans who died in WWI Africa
Description: A memorial being unveiled in Cape Town this week recognises the deaths of 1,772 predominantly Black non-combatants.

Title: Traumatize Them Back: “The Time I Vomited Blood During A Work Meeting”
Description:
